Operation no longer utilizes the facility at that location. The new location is a new building with no structural issues. In the event that we see signs of insects or rodents in the future this matter will be corrected, and documentation will be available.

Deficiency Narrative: It was reported by an employee and children that an employee had a history of cursing and yelling at and around the children.
Correction Narrative: 748.2307(8) Other Prohibited Punishments-humiliating, shaming, ridiculing, rejecting, or yelling at a child	It was reported by an employee and children that an employee had a history of cursing and yelling at and around the children.	Y	The agency should conduct a meeting with all staff and discuss the prohibited discipline, punishment and conduct outlined in Minimum Standards. The agency should consider utilizing frequent reminders of such conduct during training sessions and brief meetings. Frequent reminders can convey the subject is important to the organization and possibly reduce such incidents. The avoidance of yelling and cursing by staff can also aid in treatment. This can reduce children from being triggered and also set a positive example	A quality assurance survey is implemented into the program. All staff will be retrained on Mandated reporting to ensure they are not just hearing or witnessing but reporting and understanding what being a reporter is.  	Mandated Reporting retraining will be required and all DCS will have it completed by 5/1/2024

Deficiency Narrative: A staff member transporting children does not have a valid Texas driver's license.

Our current drivers are documented on the attached approved drivers list. A current list of drivers has been provided on separate document.
